attributes.action: reject plans in Burnley to build an Internation Islamic Boarding School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition aims to raise concerns and opposition to change a historic building, the old Burnley College, becoming an Internation Islaminc Boarding School for females.

Burnley is recently subjected to the old schools being made into "Super Schools" as a experimental town for multicultural Britian so why aren't these schools good enough for all? Why do people have to try and segregate themselves further? 

Please sign this as we cannot let these proposals go ahead, it is a contradiction to Burnley and Britain.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the local authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
